title: CAN'T LOG IN.
body:
That's the problem i am facing with...and i cant solve it ( sorry for my bad english )...Can someone please help me ? 
I checked the league status and it says online and my internet works perfect.

replies.body: It looks like thee might be an issue with your network reaching our authentication servers, so it doesn't even get a chance to receive your login info.  I suggest running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up, and into the client.  Let me know if you have any questions!
